QuestData.Title: Knocking on the Door
QuestData.Description: Now, onward to the Stormstout Brewery! It's high time that I was reunited with the rest of the Stormstouts... and what better way to reunite than over a few mugs of ale?$b$bYou know where the brewery is, right? Just follow this road to the west. You can't miss it. Of course, you're free to share the road with us - we'll be leaving any moment now.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet up with Chen Stormstout at the entrance of the Stormstout Brewery.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet up with Chen Stormstout at the entrance of the Stormstout Brewery.
